summary: 1993  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Margaret Alexis Fitzsimmons Smith , known as Alexis Smith, was a Canadian-born stage, film, and television actress and singer. She appeared in several major Hollywood movies in the 1940s and had a notable career on Broadway in the 1970s, winning a Tony Award in 1972.
title: Alexis Smith
